1) Put meat into a pan
 2) Break apart meat
 3) Cook on high for 10 - 15 minutes
 4) Add marinara sauce into cooked meat
 5) Boil water in different pot
 6) Add pasta noodles and handful of salt into boiling water
 7) Drain water once noodles are ready
 8) Combine sauce and noodles
 9) Enjoy!

Ground Beef

Marinara Sauce

Water

Pasta Noodles

1) Add olive into fry pan
 2) Put pan onto stove with medium heat for four minutes
 3) Add the prepared salmon into the pan
 4) Add pinch of salt and pepper on fish
 5) Let salmon cook for three minutes
 6) Flip salmon to cook other side for three minutes
 7) Remove salmon from pan
 8) Squeeze fresh lemon onto salmon
 9) Enjoy!

Salmon

Salt

Pepper

Lemon

Olive Oil

1) Open and strain fruit cocktail juice into mixing bowl
 2) Cube Cantaloupe, Pineapple, and Honeydew
 3) Slice Strawberries
 4) Add fruits into mixing bowl
 5) Add tub of cool whip into mixing bowl
 6) Mix contents
 7) Enjoy!
